name: Fearless Charge
description: Fear only bring the weakest of men. To be fearless is to charge on even against the face of death itself.

name: Glorious Charge
description: Glory to those who brave the fear of death and charge onward to the unknown.

name: Steady Charge
description: Steady but not too slow will win even more races and battles.

name: Frenzied Charge
description: Mindless and aggressive make the most powerful charge.

name: Devastating Charge
description: What is better objective of a charge aside to devastate the enemies utterly.

name: Stampede
description: Under the iron hooves and beneath the blazing sun, only the strongest can rise up again.

name: Breach
description: Breaching through the enemy's formation to crush whoever hiding behind is the greatest achievement every shock cavalry units should dream of.

name: Shield Charge
description: Risky yet safe, shield at the front and no archer or spearman can halt your advance.

name: Agile Charge
description: Agility is the most important aspect of a charge. You don't really charging by standing still, do you?

name: Charge Of Regret
description: The only word to describe this momentous moment is regret. The regret to not be able to relive this same exact moment ever again no matter how many times it get replicated.

name: Dread Charge
description: Oh great horror, what sin did we do to bring you into us.

name: Leaping Charge
description: Momentum gain from leaping can make any following blow a massive crushing power.

name: For Ancestor!
description: The ancestors guide us not only in the past. For now we devote our life to our beloved forebears.

name: Malabel Igiela
description: The great charge of Malabel cavalry may one day rest in a page of legend or history book, but today, let us offer condolences to the unfortunate victims of this charge.

name: Historic Moment
description: There are not many event in the world that would be worthwhile recorded into a history book. The same cannot be said for this moment.

name: Hidden Charge
description: It should be practically impossible to charge while remain hidden. And how can someone defend against such impossible feat?

name: Clumsy Charge
description: Some squads are just not suitable for charging whether it be because of their insufficient training or unsuitable equipment.

name: Heroic Charge
description: Just follows the hero and everything will be alright. They become masters of battle by staying alive after all.

name: Weak Charge
description: A weak charge can often time results in total disaster. Exercise charging tactic for unit with this skill with caution.

name: Slow Charge
description: Due to the squad's weight, its charge is much slower than usual and less effective overall.

name: Charge
description: An act of charging is often one of the most crucial turning points in any battle. A successful charge can deliver a massive shocking blow to enemy squads that completely destroy their morale or it can be total disaster that result in retreat of the charge initiator instead.

name: Giant Rush
description: A charge from giant squad can be count as one of the most devastating charge in history , it is almost impossible to hold postion against such massive blows.

name: Spearwall
description: Spearwall is a simple yet effective method to counter a charging unit. It is difficult to dodge an object when you rushing at full speed after all.

name: Shieldwall
description: What is the most common tactic used in the most disciplined troops by every world conquering empires? The answer is always shieldwall. The key basis of winning the war is to avoid having the soldiers die in senseless deaths. The longer the soldiers survive in the war, the more experience in killing they become. And the more experienced soldier make a more effective the army.

name: Shield Turtle
description: Defensive yet still mobile. This tactic is superb against approaching enemy army that excel in range attack. (All attack -5, melee defense +25, range defense +50, speed -70, cannot be flanked, cannot be broken, cannot run)

name: Shield Dome
description: The ultimate defense tactic. This shield dome leaves no vulnerable spot for enemy to attack.

name: Rapid Advance
description: Speed can often decide to fate for a battle and even a war. Being faster than enemy is never disadvantage.

name: Steady Aims
description: The most important part of range weaponry is to hit the target. Arrows missed are arrow wasted.

name: Victory Or Death
description: Sometimes retreat is a valid option but not for this time.

name: Chain Attack
description: Hitting all enemy at once in a swift fashion is not an easy feat. Extremely powerful skill in battlefield combat with no end of enemies to slay.

name: Sweep Asunder
description: Only the strong can sweep a large weapon so powerful that the blow can leave all those stand at the front asunder.

name: Silencing Glare
description: The glare so intimidating it leave anyone in sight incapable of even producing coherent speech just from fear. Devastatingly useful against mage units that entirely rely on their chanting.

name: Cantabrian Circle
description: The maneuver only possible with the mastery of both equitation and archery. To attack even when moving is the pinnacle of warfare.

name: Hold Ground
description: "Hold your ground men!",

name: Pikewall
description: The deadly charge of cavalry was the domination tactic in battlefield until the invention of pikewall tactic. By simply having infantry squads holding pikes in line, an impregnable wall is created,

name: Hidden Pike
description: A nasty surprise. Who can expect complete death trap in their charge to glory? Only fool fight a fair fight.

name: Death Volunteer
description: Volunteer to die is an act that surpass natural instinct. To excess oneself to death for victory is either madness or complete devotion.

name: Abyssal Hatred
description: Next melee attack deal damage +1% per number of squad troop killed

name: Bloodlust
description: All stat +10%, stamina +10% for every enemy squad destroyed

name: Critical Measure
description: Critical measure must be taken for this crisis or we will not survive.

name: Heavy Arrow
description: Arrow specifically made to pierce heavy armour. Less ideal for other use due to its heavy weight.

name: Fire Arrow
description: Fire arrow is often used to ignite a structure, ship or siege machine. It is also used to inflict damage to enemy morale.

name: Iron Wall
description: None shall pass!

name: Focus Strike
description: Focus and steady!

name: Absolute Devotion
description: God rewards only those that give absolute devotion to him.

name: Provoke
description: "Hey over here! Come and get me." *all kind of rude gesture*

name: Flying
description: Flying squad does not suffer terrain and height penalty while also can only be damaged by melee attack when the squad itself attacking.

name: Floating
description: Floating squad does not suffer terrain penalty but still receive height penalty. Moreover, the squad also receive melee defense bonus against squad with no Anti-Cavalry and Anti-Flying.

name: Deathblow
description: This squad can muster its last strength to deals final blow before it die. Death in melee combat will cause damage to attacker.

name: Armour Shatters
description: Armour is completely useless before this strike. Even worse, any squad that survive against this squad attack will receive armour shatter status.

name: Heroic Counter
description: Deal 20% of melee attack damage back to enemy when receive melee damage

name: Final Drive
description: Only few are prepared to meet their end. Even fewer dare to confront it.

name: Crack The Whip
description: Work for your master, slave! Nothing make slave work harder than the sound of whiplash.

name: Silver Arrow
description: Next range attack deals 100% and +100% damage to spirit, evil and demon squads

name: Collect Corpse
description: Good flesh and bone never should go to waste.
